name: HideOn
description:
Submission to the DeepWell Mental Health Game Jam by Team Honeybell

Trailer: here!

HideOn - 2D puzzle platformer to make you feel relaxed

You must make your way out to the exit while avoiding the lights.

To proceed further on some levels, you should dive deep into the ground and sometimes wait for all the danger to pass you. Play through 20 stages of gameplay and build your strategy.

Controls: Arrow Keys Or WASD; To dive into the ground: X Or K; To jump: Space, C or J key.

Credits:

  • Built using the Godot Game Engine
  • All the assets were created using Adobe Illustrator
  • Music and Audio effects source: Uppbeat
